title: Smart Data Models - HealthLevelMeasurement
description: Health Sensor Data Model intended to represent the values of heartrate, bloodpressure, bloodsugar, etc..

heartrate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. the number of times a person's heart beats (= moves regularly) in a minute

bloodpressure_h.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The top number refers to the amount of pressure in your arteries during the contraction of your heart muscle. This is called systolic pressure.

bloodpressure_l.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The bottom number refers to your blood pressure when your heart muscle is between beats. This is called diastolic pressure.

bloodsugar.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. the concentration of glucose present in the blood of humans
